page.title: 05HEALTH AT GLOUCESTER 1985
page.content: GLOUCESTERSHIRE ROYAL HOSPITAL IS SITED IN GREAT WESTERN ROAD AND REPLACES THE OLD HOSPITALS SITED IN SOUTHGATE STR AND GT.WESTERN RD. SOME DEPARTMENTS REMAIN IN SOUTHGATE STREET.THE GLOUCESTER CLINIC SITUATED IN DENMARK RD IS A PRIVATE HOSPITAL. THERE ARE FIVE NURSING HOMES IN THE CITY,ONE N.H.S. FOR SEVERELY HANDICAPPED AND FIVE PRIVATE HOMES. THE RIKENEL NHS HEALTH CENTRE IS BY THE PARK PROVIDING DENTAL,CHIROPODY, AND INFANT AND ELDERLY WELFARE CARE. NINE DOCTORS SURGERIES SERVE MOST OF THE CITY WITH 36 DOCTORS. 10 DENTAL SURGERIES EXIST WITH 26 DENTISTS.
